sentences.en: A scalpel and tweezers are the only tools needed.
sentences.cn: 只需备有解剖刀和镊子.

sentences.en: A scalpel is a surgical instrument.
He felt the scalpel in his hand, and paused a moment.
sentences.cn: 他试了试手里的手术刀, 踌躇了一会儿.

sentences.en: I pointed with my scalpel to the chest cavity, where nothing but a black lump of coal squatted in the lipstick-red center.
sentences.cn: 我用解剖刀指着她的胸腔，那里只有一团黑乎乎的煤块，伏在唇膏般红色的胸腔中部。

sentences.en: In this paper, a scalpel simulator used in Virtual Surgery System is designed.
sentences.cn: 该文设计了一种虚拟外科手术系统专用的虚拟手术刀仿真器.

sentences.en: No significant differences were found between use of the bipolar coagulator and Harmonic scalpel.
sentences.cn: 平均肿瘤大小为2.8公分(范围:1.0~5.5公分),平均住院天数为5.57天(范围:4~13天).

sentences.en: Objective To explore the efficacy of laparoscopy and ultrasonic scalpel in the treatment of renal cyst.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨腹腔镜结合超声刀治疗肾囊肿疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To observe effects internal sphincterotomy using small needle scalpel for treatment of old anal cleft.
sentences.cn: 目的采用小针刀内括约肌切断术观察陈旧性肛裂的治疗效果.

sentences.en: The haemorrhoids are removed using a scalpel, laser or staple gun.
sentences.cn: 然后术者用手术刀或激光或是特殊的钳子将痔切除.

sentences.en: The scalpel accompanys my mather everyday.
sentences.cn: 外科手术刀每天都陪伴着我妈妈.

sentences.en: The skin is now incised with the scalpel along the previously - drawn lines.
sentences.cn: 现在用手术刀依照之前所画的线切割表皮.

sentences.en: The treatment group was treated with electroacupuncture, massage, TDP, Scalpel , semiconductor - laser, and Chinese herbals.
sentences.cn: 治疗组施以电针灸 、 推拿按摩 、 TDP神灯照射 、 小针刀手术、半导体激光治疗仪照射 、 中药内服熏洗.

sentences.en: There, a little below the right shoulder blade, and to the side , his scalpel would enter.
sentences.cn: 他的刀要从那儿进去, 在右边肩胛骨下面一点儿, 靠边上的地方.

sentences.en: This is the scalpel which Norman Bethune used in those days.
sentences.cn: 这是当年白求恩大夫用的手术刀.

sentences.en: When using the scalpel, cut the crystal away from your fingers.
sentences.cn: 当使用解剖刀时, 从你的手指上切掉明矾晶体.

sentences.en: With Adam and my Scalpel, I have been transformed.
sentences.cn: 当然是用亚当和我的解剖刀, 我已经变形了!

trans.tran_en: a small, very sharp knife that is used by doctors in operations
